Key Match Events: David Fry launched the go-ahead two-run homer in the seventh inning on Thursday before laying down the safety squeeze in the ninth that led to the victory.
Pre-Game Insights: Tigers manager A.J. Hinch said. "These elimination games are incredible."
The Guardiansâ€™ Game 4 hero, David Fry, said. "I think we've seen him three or four times now this year, and I think we'll have a pretty good game plan to go against him."
Post-Match Reflections: Austin Hedges said, "I'm both excited and exhausted right now," but that's what the postseason is all about.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The winner will advance to face the Yankees in the ALCS beginning Monday night in the Bronx.
Teams that have won Game 4 when trailing 2-1 have then won Game 5 and the series 27 of 48 times (56%).
The game is airing right now on TBS and Max.
